ValidationRule.description: Primary Quote is required for all stages after Evaluation / POC stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , 'De-book Re-book')), ISBLANK( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c ), NOT( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Negotiation'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Commit'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Order in Process'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Credit') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Hey, did you know that a Primary Quote is required to move past the 'Tech Evaluation' stage? (It is.)
